productDesc: The Tesla Model 3 is a compact electric sedan that is the most affordable model in the automaker's lineup. It has a starting price of $29,000 and a range of 220 miles.
The Toyota Camry is a midsize sedan known for its reliability and fuel efficiency. It offers a comfortable ride, spacious interior, and a range of available features.
The Honda Accord is a popular midsize sedan known for its refined driving dynamics, spacious interior, and fuel-efficient engines. It offers a comfortable ride and a range of available features.
The Ford Mustang is an iconic sports car known for its powerful engines, sleek design, and engaging driving experience. It offers a range of performance options and customizable features.
The Tesla Model 3 is a compact electric sedan that is the most affordable model in the automaker's lineup. It has a starting price of $29,000 and a range of 220 miles.
The Tesla Model S is a full-size electric sedan known for its impressive range, acceleration, and technology features. It offers a luxurious interior and a smooth and quiet ride.
The Tesla Model X is a full-size electric SUV known for its falcon-wing doors, spacious interior, and impressive performance. It offers seating for up to seven passengers and a range of features.
The Tesla Model Y is a compact electric SUV that offers a balance of performance, range, and versatility. It has a starting price of $39,000 and a range of up to 300 miles.
